welcome_message_body: Welcome to Songzi, China! Experience the charming blend of traditional culture and modern innovation in this beautiful city known for its picturesque landscapes and rich history. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Songzi has to offer.

restaurants.name: Burger King (汉堡王)
restaurants.description: Burger King (汉堡王) is a fast food restaurant located in Songzi, Jingzhou.
restaurants.address: Yuling South Rd. (Baiyun Rd.), Songzi, Jingzhou, 湖北
